text: Castillo Formation can refer to: * Castillo Formation, Venezuela, an Early Miocene geologic formation in Venezuela * Castillo Formation, Argentina, a Cenomanian geologic formation in Argentina * Castillo Pedroso Formation, a Jurassic geologic formation in Spain * Cerro Castillo Formation, a Jurassic geologic formation in Argentina * Sierra del Castillo Formation, a Carboniferous geologic formation in Spain
title: Castillo Formation
